description.value: This extension adds one concepts from 'LanguageProficiency' as defined by the Dutch Health and Care Information models (Dutch: Zorginformatiebouwsteen or ZIB) version 3.1 to the nl-core-patient profile. This concept regards a comment field about the linguistic proficiency of the patient.

purpose.value: Patients who are not fluent in the language of communication often have trouble asking for help and understanding the aids. Recording and communicating language problems offers other health professionals this knowledge. This informs them of any possible communication problems. Furthermore, you can record whether the patient is fluent in another language, so that a translator can be called in to communicate with the patient if needed.

definition.value: A comment on the linguistic proficiency.
